content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25, -59)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron plates and copper plates

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-18, -53)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18, -53)
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15, -51)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5) containing iron gear wheels
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Stone furnace at (14, 14)
- Connected by belt groups for material transport

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16)
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting water flow
- Electricity network connecting multiple poles

### Mining Setup at (41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41, -82)
- Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Check if the target chest actually contains the required items before attempting extraction
- Verify the inventory contents of chests using storage_chest.inventory before extraction

### Errors when placing lab
- The position (8.5, 13.5) is already occupied by an assembling machine
- Find a clear position before attempting to place the lab
- Scan nearby areas for suitable placement locations

### Errors when accessing non-existent lab
- Ensure the lab is actually placed before trying to interact with it
- Verify the lab's position coordinates are correct
- Place the lab first before attempting to use get_entity on it

### Power system errors
- Keep track of fuel levels in burners and boilers
- Ensure coal supply is available before attempting to insert fuel
- Monitor power system status to prevent outages

### Production line issues
- Ensure all required materials are available before starting production
- Verify the correct placement and connections of all production line components
- Monitor input/output chest contents regularly
